Name: Chitin Bow
LongDescription: Protects against weather damage. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Yanma and Yanmega.  Finding a Chitin Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
